availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Lucas. Farmer in Scott County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Shelby County, Kentucky in 1860. Convicted of running a tipling house in Shelby County, Kentucky in September 1863.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-004-0563.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott, District 2, p. 439.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby, District 2, p. 60.
